title: Businessweek Talks with Hilton CEO Chris Nassetta
itunes:title: Businessweek Talks with Hilton CEO Chris Nassetta
description:
Hilton CEO Chris Nassetta discusses the impact of trade tensions on the hotel business and fixing company culture.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
